forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset code
resetCodeSent: If an account with this email exists, a reset code has been sent.
followersDescription: When people follow this user, they will appear here.
followingDescription: Users that this person follows will appear here.
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields correctly.
adjustFilters: Try adjusting your search terms or filters.
loginToComment: You must be logged in to post comments.
loginToVote: You must be logged in to vote on projects.
noCommentsYet: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!
homeSubtitle: Showcase your coding projects and connect with developers
homeWhatIsDescription: CodeFolio is a full-stack portfolio and social platform for developers and creators. Built using the MEVN stack (MongoDB, Express, Vue 3, Bun), it allows users to showcase projects, receive feedback, and interact with a like-minded community. It includes multi-modal authentication, real-time features, rich project pages, a nested comment system, and strong security.
homeFrontendDesc: Vue 3, Composition API, Vuetify, Vite, SPA Routing
homeBackendDesc: Bun, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, RESTful API
homeSecurityDesc: OAuth, JWT RS256, Encrypted keys, Secure cookies
notificationsEmptyDescription: We'll notify you when something happens
title: Title
validationEmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validationNameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
validationNameMaxLength: Name must be less than 50 characters
validationNameInvalid: Name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes
validationUsernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
validationUsernameMaxLength: Username must be less than 30 characters
validationUsernameInvalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
validationPasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validationPasswordMaxLength: Password must be less than 128 characters
validationPasswordRequirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
validationTitleMinLength: Title must be at least 3 characters
validationTitleMaxLength: Title must be less than 100 characters
validationDescriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 10 characters
validationDescriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than 500 characters
validationResetCodeInvalid: Invalid reset code. Please enter the 6-digit code sent to your email.
tourWelcome: Welcome to CodeFolio! This tour will quickly show you the main features. Let's begin!
tourLogoBrand: Click the CodeFolio logo anytime to return to the home page.
tourThemeToggle: Switch between light and dark mode to suit your preference.
tourLanguageSwitcher: Change the site language between English and Vietnamese.
tourHomeNav: Go to the home page to see featured projects and platform info.
tourProjectsNav: Browse all projects from the community. Use filters and search to find what you need.
tourProjectsPageWelcome: This is the Projects page where you can discover and explore community projects.
tourProjectsSearch: Search for projects by title, description, tags, or author.
tourProjectTypeFilter: Filter projects by type, such as Web, Mobile, API, and more.
tourProjectSort: Sort projects by newest, most viewed, or top rated to find trending work.
tourProjectCards: Click a project card to view more details and interact.
tourProjectDetailWelcome: See all details about the project and join the discussion.
tourProjectHeader: View the project title, author, and tags. Click the author to see their profile.
tourProjectVoting: Upvote or downvote projects to help highlight quality work.
tourGithubLink: Open the project on GitHub to see the code or contribute.
tourProjectContent: Read the full project description and features.
tourGithubStats: See GitHub stats like stars, forks, and issues.
tourProjectDetails: View project metadata such as creation date and views.
tourComments: Add comments, ask questions, or give feedback to the author.
tourHomeHero: Showcase your work and connect with other developers.
tourFeaturedProjects: Check out featured projects selected from the community.
tourPlatformOverview: See what features CodeFolio offers for developers.
tourLoginButton: Sign in to unlock all features like posting and commenting.
tourRegisterButton: Create an account to join and share your projects.
tourNotifications: Check your notifications for updates and activity.
tourUserMenu: Access your profile, account settings, and logout here.
tourProfileHeader: See your avatar, name, username, and contact info.
tourFollowStats: View your followers and who you are following.
tourEditProfileBtn: Edit your profile details and photo.
tourAddProjectBtn: Add a new project to your portfolio.
tourExportPdf: Export your profile as a PDF file.
tourMyProjects: See all projects you have shared.
tourAdminNav: Open the admin panel to manage users, posts, and analytics.
tourAdminDashboard: Overview of admin tools and platform stats.
tourAdminTabs: Switch between Users, Posts, and Analytics tabs.
tourAdminTabPosts: Manage all posts and projects on the platform.
tourCompleteMessage: Tour complete! You're ready to explore and use CodeFolio.
notFoundMessage: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
statisticsDescription: Comprehensive analytics and insights for the CodeFolio platform
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
author: Author
tourSearchHashtagMention: Tip: Use {'#'} to search by tag (e.g. {'#'}vue) or {'@'} to search by username (e.g. {'@'}lumi).
tourCommentsMention: Tip: Type {'@'} in the comment box to mention someone (e.g. {'@'}lumi).
resetPasswordFailed: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
resetPasswordSuccess: Password reset successful! You can now log in with your new password.
